title: Changes from jit branch
body_html:
Major features:

  • New torch.contrib namespace, for holding experimental, user-contributed functionality in an easy to get to place. Added torch.contrib._graph_vis, which is an experimental module that can visualize torch.jit graphs.
  • The graph fuser handles Concats now, does pretty good on word_language_model now

Refactor:

  • Attributes and the IR are const-correct now
  • Some code has been moved into its own header files
body_text:
Major features:

New torch.contrib namespace, for holding experimental, user-contributed functionality in an easy to get to place. Added torch.contrib._graph_vis, which is an experimental module that can visualize torch.jit graphs.
The graph fuser handles Concats now, does pretty good on word_language_model now

Refactor:

Attributes and the IR are const-correct now
Some code has been moved into its own header files
body:
Major features:

* New `torch.contrib` namespace, for holding experimental, user-contributed functionality in an easy to get to place. Added `torch.contrib._graph_vis`, which is an experimental module that can visualize torch.jit graphs.
* The graph fuser handles Concats now, does pretty good on word_language_model now

Refactor:
* Attributes and the IR are const-correct now
* Some code has been moved into its own header files
